header.title: Introduction to cosTime

section.title: Overview
section.p: The cosTime application is Time and TimerEvent Services compliant with the OMG Services CosTime and CosTimerEvent.

section.title: Purpose and Dependencies
section.p: This application use calender:now_to_universal_time(Now) to create a UTC. Hence, the underlying OS must deliver a correct result when calling erlang:now().
cosTime is dependent on Orber, which provides CORBA functionality in an Erlang environment.
cosTimerEvent is dependent on Orber and cosNotification, which provides CORBA functionality and Event handling in an Erlang environment.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: To fully understand the concepts presented in the documentation, it is recommended that the user is familiar with distributed programming, CORBA, the Orber and cosNotification applications.
Recommended reading includes CORBA, Fundamentals and Programming - Jon Siegel and Open Telecom Platform Documentation Set. It is also helpful to have read Concurrent Programming in Erlang.
